About.title: About this site
About.description: A personal tech blog and portfolio for hiring and collaboration
About.intro: Hi, I'm ZHalio. This is my personal blog and lightweight portfolio.
About.content: I focus on web/full-stack work (Next.js, React, Supabase, Tailwind) and share hands-on notes about engineering quality, performance, and maintainability. This site also extends my resume: it gathers project cases, technical articles, and runnable demos so you can quickly see how I build and ship products.
